imdb.plot outline: Artists, photographer and film-makers, explore the theme of the commodification of the female body in modern society through colors, pop images of clear reference to the '60s. The originality of this initiative and the effectiveness of its representations, which often happen to meet while walking the streets of London, have brought it the conquest of several photographic awards and film.
imdb.title: A World of Women
plot: Artists, photographer and film-makers, explore the theme of the commodification of the female body in modern society through colors, pop images of clear reference to the '60s.
